template.template: Template ILOM ORACLE SRV X8-2 SNMP Trap
template.name: Template ILOM ORACLE SRV X8-2 SNMP Trap

item.name: sunHwTrapHeartbeat
item.description: A heartbeat used to verify the SNMP trap configuration. This trap is periodically generated and used to verify ongoing trap configuration, network connectivity and system identification. This functionality is required by Oracle Auto Service Request (ASR): http://www.oracle.com/us/support/auto-service-request/

trigger.name: Not received heartbeat from {HOST.NAME}
trigger.description: A heartbeat used to verify the SNMP trap configuration. This trap is periodically generated and used to verify ongoing trap configuration, network connectivity and system identification. This functionality is required by Oracle Auto Service Request (ASR): http://www.oracle.com/us/support/auto-service-request/

trigger.name: {HOST.NAME} : A component in the IO subsystem is suspected of causing a fault.
{HOST.NAME} : A component is suspected of causing a fault.
trigger.description: This generic 'component' trap is generated when the SNMP agent does not recognize the component type.

trigger.name: {HOST.NAME} : A drive controller component is suspected of causing a fault.
{HOST.NAME} : A fan component is suspected of causing a fault
{HOST.NAME} : A hard drive component is suspected of causing a fault
{HOST.NAME} : A hard drive sensor has detected an error.
{HOST.NAME} : A memory component is suspected of causing a fault.
{HOST.NAME} : An IO sensor has detected an error
{HOST.NAME} : A power supply component is suspected of causing a fault
{HOST.NAME} : A processor component is suspected of causing a fault
{HOST.NAME} : A processor sensor has detected an error.
{HOST.NAME} : A RAID component is suspected of causing a fault.
{HOST.NAME} : A RAID sensor has detected an error.
{HOST.NAME} : A slot or connector component is suspected of causing a fault.
{HOST.NAME} : A state change in host power has taken place.
